The present work demonstrates that the glucocorticoid dexamethasone inhibits TPA - induced increases in <extra_id_0> c-jun <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> c-fos <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA levels in U-937 leukemia cells .

text: To further define the effects of dexamethasone at the molecular level , we prepared a series of deleted <extra_id_0> c-jun <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoter fragments linked to the <extra_id_0> chloramphenicol acetyltransferase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( <extra_id_0> CAT <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) gene .
